name: Ruinous Scythe
description: Slice into your enemy's life force, dealing 1799 Physical Damage.   Every third cast of this ability will set all enemies hit Off Balance.  You heal for 2400 Health for the first enemy hit, and an additional 800 for each additional enemy, up to five times.  The healing of this ability scales off your Max Health.
effectLines: Converts to a Stamina ability and deals Physical Damage. Every third cast will set enemies Off Balance.
coefDescription: Slice into your enemy's life force, dealing $1 Physical Damage.   Every third cast of this ability will set all enemies hit Off Balance.  You heal for $2 Health for the first enemy hit, and an additional $3 for each additional enemy, up to five times.  The healing of this ability scales off your Max Health.
